column4: How do I set up a printer with Edgy/Xfce at the moment abiword defaults to lpr but I have a usb printer. do i need drivers? or do I just have to set it to the right usb port. (printer is a canon s630)
i normally just go to localhost or 127.0.0.1:631 in my browser and configure cups from there
that should work with anything using cups from solaris to ubuntu
